origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_projects', 'description': 'This function analyzes financial innovation projects in specified countries and sectors.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'countries', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of countries to analyze.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial sector of interest, e.g., inclusive finance.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'An analysis of the trends in financial innovation projects in the specified countries and sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_projects, 它的参数输入如下: 'countries'是['Germany', 'France', 'Italy'], 'sector'是'inclusive finance'.
